content.query:
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL cred_oftentrain
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_silver
WITH
(
LOCATION = 'https://otairbnbdatalakedin.blob.core.windows.net/silver/',
CREDENTIAL = cred_oftentrain
)


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_gold
WITH
(
LOCATION = 'https://otairbnbdatalakedin.blob.core.windows.net/gold',
CREDENTIAL = cred_oftentrain
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT format_parquet
WITH
(
FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.airbnbexternal
WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'airbnbexternal',
	DATA_SOURCE = source_gold,
	FILE_FORMAT = format_parquet
)
AS
SELECT * FROM gold.airbnb
